name: Add new Trello cards as rows in Google Sheets
description: Streamline your project management by automatically tracking Trello card activities. With this template, every time a new card is created in Trello, Make will instantly add a corresponding row in Google Sheets. This allows you to maintain an organized log of your Trello cards, making it easier to monitor progress and manage tasks effectively. Perfect for teams looking to enhance their workflow and keep all card details in one accessible location.
